name: Marine Life
description: Quick Summary: This is a game about underwater exploration. You start off in a submarine and move through Earth’s oceans passing by many underwater creatures. The classroom blackboard will display information about each creature as you pass by it (uses scriptable objects). You will be able to hover over the creature and see core information regarding it (mass, lifecycle, etc) Setting: You will be able to visit various biomes such as coral reefs, kelp forests, deep waters, Mariana trench. Interactivity: The player will be able to move freely around the submarine and eventually outside the submarine. The player will be able to pick up rocks and flora and see information explaining its nature. The goal of the game is to explore all ocean biomes and learn more about them. Affect: The emotion this game is trying to make is feeling excited to learn about Marine Biology.
